articles.title: 18 injured as vehicle crashes into median
articles.description: The accident took place due to “reckless driving” and the driver of the Tata Ace is absconding, said police.
articles.content: At least 18 persons were injured, two of them critically, when a vehicle they were travelling in hit a median in the Hastings area of Kolkata city on Sunday morning.
